qlabel: 1 LABC_aPTL_RADIO_1_1 - In the last working week, did you work in a pathology laboratory? [INTERVIEWER: Definition: A pathology laboratory is where tissues, organs, bodily fluids are examined and autopsies conducted in order to study and diagnose disease]

1A1A1 LABC_aPTL_RADIO_1_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you use a laboratory fume hood or fume cupboard when handling formaldehyde, specimens preserved in formaldehyde solution (formalin) or waste containing formaldehyde?
1A2 LABC_aPTL_RADIO_1_1A2 - In the last working week, did you carry out macroscopy or grossing of specimens preserved in formaldehyde solution (formalin)?
1A2A1 LABC_aPTL_CHECK_1_1A2A1 - Which of the following did you use when handling specimens preserved in formaldehyde solution (formalin) during macroscopy or grossing in the last working week?

categories.catLabel: aPTL_1A2A1B Laboratory fume hood or fume cupboard

qlabel: 1A2A2 LABC_aPTL_RADIO_1_1A2A2 - In the last working week, did you keep the specimens or waste in sealed containers when not in use?
1A3 LABC_aPTL_CHECK_1_1A3 - In the last working week, did you carry out any of the following tasks?

categories.catLabel: aPTL_1A3A Draining of specimens preserved in formalin
aPTL_1A3B Draining of waste formalin solutions
aPTL_1A3C Decanting of waste formalin solutions

qlabel: 1A4 LABC_aPTL_RADIO_1_1A4 - In the last working week, did you use respiratory protection?
1A4A1 LABC_aPTL_CHECK_1_1A4A1 - What types of respiratory protective equipment (RPE) did you use?

categories.catLabel: aPTL_1A4A1A Rubber face mask fitted with a particle/vapour filter or a cartridge
aPTL_1A4A1C Air-supplied respirator or SCBA (self-contained breathing apparatus)
aPTL_1A4A1D A filtering face piece mask or dust mask (called an FFP)

qlabel: 1 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1 - In the last working week, did you handle radioactive materials (e.g., radioisotopes) or radiation-producing machines (e.g., x-ray equipment) at work?

1A1A1 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A1A1 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective shields (e.g., lead or plexiglass shields) when working with these radioisotopes?
1A1A2 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A1A2 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective garments, (such as lead aprons, gloves, thyroid guards) when working with these radioisotopes?

1A2A1A1A2 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2A1A1A2 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective garments (such as lead aprons, gloves, thyroid guards) when working with these machines?
1A2A1A2 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2A1A2 - In the last working week, did you work with or near machines that used X-rays for Interventional Radiography (e.g., Fluoroscopy, Angioplasty)?
1A2A1A2A1 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2A1A2A1 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective shields (e.g., screens, drapes) when working with these machines?
1A2A1A2A2 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2A1A2A2 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective garments, (such as lead aprons, gloves, thyroid guards) when working with these machines?

1A2A2A2 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2A2A2 - In the last working week, did you use radio-protective garments (such as lead aprons, gloves, thyroid guards) when administering radiotherapy?
1A2B1 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2B1 - In the last working week, did you work with or near radiation producing machines (e.g., X-ray machines, X-ray analysis apparatus)?
1A2B1A1 LABC_aMXR_RADIO_10_1A2B1A1 - In the last working week, did you have structural shields to protect from radiation?
